text: Arasesata cayatane tara paraa te'omlokara padaskhalana ghatale arau te'omloka ya’ta achila tara paraa te'omlokaka bahiskrta karaale, arau ami ka’lo, ‘tomaloke nami yoraa; tomaloke ijane sijanara satrau. Arau tomalokara babe prthiraita ache nirdisti samaya laike abasa arau bhoga-upabhogara upakarana’
